ygData.msgSnippet: Train Wreck looks at her. Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me like when we got out spark shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out your spark and snuck

Train Wreck looks at her.

"Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me like when we got=
 out spark shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out your spark a=
nd snuck it in, somebody must have hated you alot, but don't worry, yuor sa=
fe with us now." Train Wreck said.

"Be careful, I tried to kill a guy." St=
ranato said.

"Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbomber said.

"It seems =
you don't know about the war, you were peaceful on Cybertron, so lets teach=
 you what to do to stay alive on this horrid planet." Train Wreck said.

"Y=
eah, first of all, ya gotta drink this stuff!" Stronghold said to Infectra,=
 taking a big gulp of beer.

"Yeah, and you smoke these!" Blender said, smo=
king a cigar. Train Wreck walked up and slapped them both in the back of th=
e head.

"I can help, I love to help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks over and=
 smokes a cigar, blowing some smoke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck comes u=
p behind Arrow and taps his shoulder. Arrow turns around and Train Wreck sl=
aps him in the face.

"Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they don't know a=
ny better." Train Wreck said to Infectra...
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June =
29, 2000 11:05 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *The Bots optics open a=
nd she looks around* Infectra:...where am I????.......the last thing I reme=
mber I was seeing my friedns go plunging to the floor and then this large b=
ot sends this claw out at me....but......that's all I remember..... *She sa=
ys to particular bot*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
=
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
    =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she =
wanted a new character to be made from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be=
 anything like Drazom.
     
    Train Wreck works on Drazom. He looks at a=
ll of the sparks they had in storage.

    "Now how did this one get in her=
e? This spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train Wreck said.

    "So how di=
d it get in there?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark=
, curious to find out who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom, wh=
ich was remade into whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks noth=
ing like Drazom. Train Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the robo=
t to come to life...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovea=
lllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, June 29, 200=
0 10:21 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      (OOC: I want to bring =
in a new character. I already have an idea..)
        ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sen=
t: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:08 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
      Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wante=
d to die, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife=
 had no affect, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of hi=
s job he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the=
 Radicon's wrecked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's =
body on a table.

        "Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram =
him to serve us." Stranato said.

        "I don't think so, his spark look=
s to be extinguished, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck =
said.

        "I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranato said.

        "It =
wasn't you who killed him, he froze to death, just sorry he didn't make it.=
" Train Wreck said.

        "No, you don't understand, I tried to kill him=
, I'm no better than the cold! I don't understand why I did something like =
that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He sighed.

        "Maybe I'm=
 just a son of a--"

        "No, you are acting stupid now! Your murderer =
curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and your logic circuits." T=
rain Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

        "I hope your right." Strana=
to said. Train Wreck looked at the body.

        "We could always put a ne=
w spark in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corne=
r.

        "We could have used him, and instead we let him die and didn't =
save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

        OCC: Orc=
hid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark collection (From d=
eathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new character with D=
razoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body and you can =
bring in a new character without having him or her look like Drazom at all,=
 your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body even, just pick so=
mething, please...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: =
ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday=
, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *=
The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It was already s=
nowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring out of his bac=
k* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn't really the=
 knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies there......an=
d mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's optics flicker a=
nd fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....That was a queston th=
at would never be answered*





          (OOC: Please Drazom on the Decea=
sed bots page. as that he died from the lack of emch fluid and because of h=
ow cold it was)
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From:=
 THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, J=
une 29, 2000 6:54 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            =
The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back=
 and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

            "There's the guy =
I saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

            "I do=
n't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up b=
ehind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen f=
rom the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Draz=
om's back.

            Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

 =
           "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.

         =
   "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranat=
o...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilovea=
lllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Wednes=
day, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
          *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:.=
...no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......M=
antella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...he=
y....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a =
tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the gro=
und shivering from how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
    =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
  =
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, June 2=
7, 2000 10:59 PM
                Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                =
Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away.=
 Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off with them=
. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and=
 ran after them as well.

                "Know what my names gonna be now?=
 I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

                "Who cares about=
 you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to grab Stranato but he cartw=
heeled out of the way.

                "We left that idiot Arrow in your C=
R Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

                "WHAT!?" Stranato =
yelled.

                "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired=
 there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

          =
      The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something th=
at none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. T=
he People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

            =
    "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                "What abou=
t this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                "Never mind him." Train Wrec=
k said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come alon=
g while he walked with his comrades.

                Dracona was getting f=
urious, and so was Gangon.

                "Sorry Gangon, I did all I coul=
d, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waite=
d while Dracona flew away.

                "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie=
 meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

                Dracona didn't hear and landed =
next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and A=
rtist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret passage way, the com=
puter reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a =
door.

                "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train W=
reck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

        =
        "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big =
enough to put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room=
 before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Ble=
nder followed.

                "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running i=
nto the room. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train =
Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room to sort out their problems.=
 There was alot of banging, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling=
, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona=
.

                "Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydra=
te drinking water!" Stronghold said.

                "What are we going to=
 do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

                "I have more needs t=
han all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" =
Stranato yelled.

                "How come we can't all get along! I don't=
 like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was g=
oing to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

                "You see? T=
hat's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stup=
id rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

                "Yeah, a=
nd nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber=
 said.

                Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up ag=
ain, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in=
 cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this=
 room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and S=
tronghold and Blender joined them before long.

                "Say, you g=
uys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

          =
      "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arro=
w said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stron=
ghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

                Plintissa and Dra=
cona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, takin=
g a walk across a field...

-----------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------
